short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to list when an account first participated in r/wallstreetbets next to their name.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Recently there has been an influx of users to reddit.com/r/wallstreetbets, and this has resulted in a flood of posts from users who had previously never participated in the subreddit. Many accounts now posting in r/wallstreetbets are several years old but have large gaps in post histories and never posted in r/wallstreetbets, which means they were likely bought.

This extension adds a flair next to a user's name in r/wallstreetbets that shows how long they have participated in the subreddit for. Using this information, you can make a better choice about whether a user is trustworthy or not or whether a user is a spam bot.
